faqs.q: How many calories in a peanut butter jelly sandwich?
faqs.a: Approximately 380 kcal for a standard version with 2 slices white bread, 2 tbsp PB, and 1 tbsp jelly.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a PB&J sandwich?
faqs.a: About 14g protein, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Are PB&J sandwiches high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, around 20g sugars per sandwich, mainly from jelly and bread.

faqs.q: How does natural peanut butter affect calories?
faqs.a: Natural PB has fewer added sugars/oils, potentially reducing calories by 20-50 kcal per sandwich.
